name: Sunday NightCraft Music Battle
description:
Enjoy new Sunday night Fnf music mod, Mini Craft Music Battle is fun a rhythm matching music game with pixel graphics test your reflexes. Play as pixel fnf boyfriend and tap the right arrows to beat the music.

Sunday night Mini Craft FNF Music Battle 2D Features:
-Easy mobile Controls just like original Fnf
-Multiple Levels(Week)
-Unlock new fnf opponents and levels
-Play against pixel FNF daddy, mummy, monster, spico, spirit and more
-All Pixel FNF Opponents have different music styles

Enjoy Sunday night Mini Craft FNF Music Battle 2D and have fun. drop a review to help us improve the game for better gameplay experience for you.
